SELECT
from dj_basics_worker_goods ORDER BY create_date desc

select sum(wg.price*abw.shop_count) from dj_basics_worker_goods wg,dj_actuary_budget_worker abw where wg.data_status = 0 and wg.id = abw.worker_goods_id and abw.house_id=#{houseId} and abw.delete_state!=1 and abw.delete_state!=2 and abw.house_flow_id=#{houseFlowId}

select sum(wg.price*abw.shop_count) from dj_basics_worker_goods wg,dj_actuary_budget_worker abw where wg.data_status = 0 and wg.id = abw.worker_goods_id and abw.house_id=#{houseId} and abw.delete_state =3 and abw.house_flow_id=#{houseFlowId}

SELECT id, name, worker_goods_sn as workerGoodsSn, image, unit_id as unitId, unit_name as unitName, price, sales, istop, other_name as otherName, work_explain as workExplain, worker_dec as workerDec, worker_standard as workerStandard, worker_type_id as workerTypeId, show_goods as showGoods, create_date as createDate, modify_date as modifyDate from dj_basics_worker_goods where data_status = 0 and show_goods=1
and name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
AND w.worker_type_id =#{workerTypeId}
ORDER BY istop DESC,create_date desc

SELECT id, name, istop, worker_goods_sn as workerGoodsSn, image, unit_id as unitId, unit_name as unitName, price, other_name as otherName, sales, work_explain as workExplain, worker_dec as workerDec, worker_standard as workerStandard, worker_type_id as workerTypeId, show_goods as showGoods, create_date as createDate, modify_date as modifyDate from dj_basics_worker_goods where id =#{id} ORDER BY istop DESC,create_date desc

( SELECT p.id AS id, p.image AS image, p.price AS price, p.unit_name AS unitName, g.type AS goodsType, 0 AS type, p.NAME AS NAME FROM dj_basics_product p INNER JOIN dj_basics_goods g ON g.id = p.goods_id INNER JOIN dj_basics_brand_series s ON s.id = p.brand_series_id WHERE p.data_status = 0 AND p.type = 1 AND p.maket = 1 AND p.image !='qrcode/moren.png' AND s.image !='' AND s.image is not null ORDER BY rand( ) LIMIT 6 ) UNION ALL ( SELECT id AS id, image AS image, price AS price, unit_name AS unitName, NULL AS goodsType, 1 AS type, NAME AS NAME FROM dj_basics_worker_goods WHERE data_status = 0 AND show_goods = 1 AND image !='qrcode/moren.png' AND worker_dec !='' AND worker_dec is not null ORDER BY rand( ) LIMIT 6 )
